name: Yoga - Vinyasa
description: Vinyasa is dynamic way of linking breath to movement, and sequencing is often built around sun salutations. The class is approachable and non-competitive, and students are encouraged to find their own rhythm and pace. In the class you will build heat, endurance, flexibility, strength and concentration. Classes are for all levels; in Level 1-2 basics will be reviewed and pace may be slower.
